title: Rent Day
provenance_text:
Riche collection. Professor Cauvet, Caen, France; A. LeSemptier, Caen, France; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, August 5, 1905 until November 7, 1927 [1]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927.

Notes:
[1]. Early provenance from a letter by Mr. DuPuy to Homer St. Gaudens, director of the museum, dated September 6, 1927, in curatorial file. Professor Cauvet is likely Jules Cauvet [1811-1884], Professor of Roman Law at La Facult√© de Droit de Caen, France.
